page.title: 11Hexton Primary School
page.content: {53 chidren attend Hexton School.}The Infant class has 22 pupils aged between 4 and 7 years old, and the Junior class has 31 pupils aged between 7 and 11 years. School starts at{0900}and ends at{1530.}Lessons are held for 5.3 hours with three playtimes during the day. All the children eat lunch at school.{Most {pupils travel to school by car}since they live in towns or villages up to ten miles distant. Five children live in Hexton and walk to school. Parents send their children here because the rural surroundings are so pleasant and because the school has a reputation for good teaching. The recently retired Headteacher and his wife worked here for 26 years and enjoyed the school and village so much that they decided to live here permanently.
